医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
绽放健康：展现食用花卉花瓣的完美美德对食用花卉的营养和治疗功效的全面审查强调了它们在健康、粮食安全和环境可持续性方面的作用。这项研究深入了解了花卉的营养成分、生物活性化合物带来的潜在健康益处，以及植物修复和天然染料等创新的可持续用途。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Blooming-health-Unfolding-the-petal-perfect-virtues-of-edible-flowers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Blooming-health-Unfolding-the-petal-perfect-virtues-of-edible-flowers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf827223-25b1-4f82-b01c-8a7195e61ba5 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 23:17:00 -0500 Blooming health: Unfolding the petal-perfect virtues of edible flowers
正在进行的研究调查超加工食品是否影响年轻人的大脑化学和肥胖风险研究人员正在探索富含超加工食品的饮食如何影响大脑的奖励处理，并可能导致年轻人食物摄入量增加和肥胖。该试验旨在阐明这些食物在关键发育阶段对大脑化学和决策的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Ongoing-study-investigates-if-ultra-processed-foods-influence-brain-chemistry-and-obesity-risk-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Ongoing-study-investigates-if-ultra-processed-foods-influence-brain-chemistry-and-obesity-risk-in-young-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ad51a98-c9be-483d-ab26-cf9b61669b46 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 23:03:00 -0500 Ongoing study investigates if ultra-processed foods influence brain chemistry and obesity risk in young adults
在灵长类动物研究中，粘膜疫苗显示出对 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 的持久防御作用在这项开创性的研究中，研究人员开发了一种粘膜腺病毒载体疫苗 ChAd-SARS-CoV-2-S，该疫苗在非人类灵长类动物中表现出针对具有挑战性的 Omicron 变体的持续而强大的免疫力，这为持久的 COVID-19 保护策略指明了一个有希望的方向。与传统的肌肉注射疫苗不同，这种粘膜疫苗引发了全面的免疫反应，可能为更有效、更持久的 COVID-19 疫苗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Mucosal-vaccine-shows- permanent-defense-against-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-in-primate-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Mucosal-vaccine-shows- permanent-defense-against-SARS-CoV-2-Omicron-in-primate-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e4ea112-0d00-4619-9794-2febf2c0a1bf Thu, 09 Nov 2023 22:39:00 -0500 Mucosal vaccine shows lasting defense against SARS-CoV-2 Omicron in primate study
21 世纪儿科病毒威胁激增：呼吁采取“同一个健康”方法《儿科研究》的范围界定审查审视了 21 世纪儿科病毒性疾病的兴起，并强调了整合人类、动物和生态系统健康的“同一个健康”方法的重要性，以有效应对这些新出现和重新出现的传染病威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Pediatric-viral-threats-surge-in-the-21st- century-A-call-for-One-Health-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Pediatric-viral-threats-surge-in-the-21st- century-A-call-for-One-Health-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd8b4349-97cb-490f-9b09-715b8f9be5ff Thu, 09 Nov 2023 22:13:00 -0500 Pediatric viral threats surge in the 21st century: A call for One Health approach
新的审查表明，过敏与长期感染新冠病毒的风险增加有关系统评价表明，哮喘和过敏性鼻炎等已有的过敏性疾病可能与长期感染新冠病毒的风险增加有关。尽管有一些证据，但由于潜在的偏见和混杂因素，确定性仍然很低，这凸显出需要进行更严格的研究来确定这些过敏对长期 COVID-19 症状的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Allergies-linked-to-heightened-risk-of-long-COVID-new-review-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Allergies-linked-to-heightened-risk-of-long-COVID-new-review-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=341e1b2c-4486-4b50-92fa-99ee200e47dd Thu, 09 Nov 2023 21:46:00 -0500 Allergies linked to heightened risk of long COVID, new review suggests
C-Path 发布关于转变神经系统疾病药物开发的新出版物关键路径研究所 (C-Path) 很高兴地宣布发布一份新的同行评审出版物，题为“神经系统疾病药物开发的转变：多疾病领域研讨会的论文集”，现已发表在《神经治疗学》杂志上美国实验神经治疗学会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/C-Path-releases-new-publication-on-transforming-drug-development-for-neurological-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/C-Path-releases-new-publication-on-transforming-drug-development-for-neurological-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68db9ff3-8af6-4d9e-9e56-902b77a9c51a Thu, 09 Nov 2023 17:43:00 -0500 C-Path releases new publication on transforming drug development for neurological disorders
激光脱毛可降低藏毛病患者复发的风险Nemours 外科主任、医学博士 Peter C. Minneci 进行的研究表明，激光脱毛（俗称激光脱毛）可降低藏毛病患者复发的风险，毛病是一种炎症、疼痛，有时是慢性或复发性疾病。 《儿童健康》，特拉华谷，并发表在《美国医学会杂志外科杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Laser-hair-removal-reduces-the-risk-of-recurrence-in-病人-with-pilonidal-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Laser-hair-removal-reduces-the-risk-of-recurrence-in-病人-with-pilonidal-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9f00e37-48c3-4060-88d6-4af629c07e00 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 17:35:00 -0500 Laser hair removal reduces the risk of recurrence in patients with pilonidal disease
研究人员发现了一种可以保持人体细胞健康的新型细菌蛋白巴西圣保罗大学 (USP) 的研究人员与澳大利亚的同事合作，发现了一种新型细菌蛋白，即使在细胞细菌负担很重的情况下，它也可以保持人类细胞的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Researchers-identify-a-novel-bacterial- Protein-that-c​​an-keep- human-cells-healthy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Researchers-identify-a-novel-bacterial- Protein-that-c​​an-keep- human-cells-healthy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2cc1878-b528-41e0-b28c-e9ebe2b45c7d Thu, 09 Nov 2023 16:15:00 -0500 Researchers identify a novel bacterial protein that can keep human cells healthy
FORTE 招募首批 1000 名参与者参加备受期待的结直肠癌预防试验FORTE (NRG-CC005) 是一项备受期待的结直肠癌预防试验，由 NRG Oncology 领导，检查患有非晚期息肉的参与者的结肠镜检查间隔监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/FORTE-accrues-first-1000-participants-for-highly-anticipated-colorectal-cancer-prevention-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/FORTE-accrues-first-1000-participants-for-highly-anticipated-colorectal-cancer-prevention-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df7ddd4b-b161-4cc1-a529-40a052f161f4 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 14:56:00 -0500 FORTE accrues first 1000 participants for highly anticipated colorectal cancer prevention trial
多发性硬化症患者可以从低脂饮食中受益俄勒冈健康与科学大学的新研究表明，多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者可以从低脂饮食中受益，以改善疲劳，这是一种使人衰弱且常常被低估的疾病症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/People-with-multiple-sclerosis-could-benefit-from-a-low-fat-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/People-with-multiple-sclerosis-could-benefit-from-a-low-fat-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d120192c-0de3-4b58-a96e-ea99d06b8eef Thu, 09 Nov 2023 14:45:00 -0500 People with multiple sclerosis could benefit from a low-fat diet
